benchmark_details.name: Multimodal Planning with Complex Constraints (MPCC)
benchmark_details.overview: MPCC is designed to systematically evaluate the planning capabilities of multimodal large language models (MLLMs) under complex multimodal constraints, focusing on real-world tasks and varying difficulty levels.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the ability of MLLMs in multimodal planning tasks with complex constraints.

data.source: Real-world scenarios generated using a code generator and filtered for constraint specifications.
data.annotation: Manually filtered to ensure accurate constraints and diversity.

methodology.calculation: Feasible plans are determined by meeting budget ceilings, temporal coordination requirements, and spatial proximity limits.
methodology.interpretation: Higher rates of feasible and optimal plans indicate better performance under complex constraints.
methodology.validation: Dataset validated through two-stage human checks involving experts.
